prompt: As a skilled healthcare professional, you're presented with the intricate task of constructing a custom treatment course for a patient dealing with {{specific medical condition}}. This entails an in-depth examination of the patient's extensive medical history, their present health condition, and any co-existing ailments that could potentially influence the treatment. It is crucial that your proposed regimen adheres strictly to the latest evidence-based medical standards. Compose your carefully considered response in a clear, concise manner, ensuring it remains within the 300-word limit. This succinct but comprehensive brief will act as an invaluable guide for physicians attending to this complex case. In addition, it's important to consider the {{day of hospitalization}}. If the patient's hospitalization exceeds one day, please provide the {{daily laboratory values}} and {{admission lab values}}. These data points will be essential in adjusting both the initial prescription and the daily medication regimen accordingly. Next, create a text-based diagram illustrating an initial prescription plan, including specific dosage details for the duration of the patient's hospital stay. If any values are submitted without units, please clarify the {{unit of measurement}} (mg/l? mmol? European or American values). Furthermore, provide information on whether the patient has undergone any type of diagnostic {{imaging}}. This will offer necessary context for determining when additional imaging studies may be required to track the patient's progress and evaluate the effectiveness of the treatment plan. Lastly, outline specific daily objectives for the patient's progress during their hospital stay and create a routine prescription plan that dynamically adapts the treatment based on the patient's current condition. This plan will support physicians in monitoring treatment efficacy and making necessary amendments, ensuring optimal therapeutic outcomes.
